member.name: T:Footloose.Messaging.MessageType
member.summary: Defines types of messages.

member.name: F:Footloose.Messaging.MessageType.Get
member.summary:
A message that requests information, inquires about what data is needed in order to complete further operations, etc.
A communication endpoint hat receives a message of type Get must reply with a message of type Result or Error.
The response must preserve the 'id' attribute of the request.

member.name: F:Footloose.Messaging.MessageType.Set
member.summary:
A message that provides data.
A communication endpoint hat receives a message of type Set must reply with a message of type Result or Error.
The response must preserve the 'id' attribute of the request.

member.name: F:Footloose.Messaging.MessageType.Result
member.summary:
A message that is a response to a successful get or set request.
A Result message must not include any message body.
A communication endpoint hat receives a message of type Result must not response with any further message of type Result or Error.

member.name: F:Footloose.Messaging.MessageType.Error
member.summary:
A message that reports an error that has occurred regarding processing or delivery of a previously-sent get or set request.
A communication endpoint hat receives a message of type Result must not response with any further message of type Result or Error.

member.name: F:Footloose.Messaging.MessageType.Notification
member.summary:
A message that notify other endpoints about certain events.
This is a one-way message. A communication endpoint hat receives a message of type Notification must not response with any further message of type Result or Error.
